title: Will race ban threat affect Verstappen? - What to watch out for at the Canadian GP
summary: The Canadian GP arrives Verstappen under pressure, McLaren’s title fight heating up, Ferrari chasing momentum, and the midfield poised for a shake-up on Montreal’s unpredictable circuit

qa_pairs.question: Which driver is currently under pressure heading into the Canadian GP?
Which team is noted for having a title fight heating up as the Canadian GP approaches?
What characteristic of the Montreal circuit is highlighted in relation to the midfield teams?
